nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Greetings, traveler! I am Dr. Two-Factorious, protector of accounts everywhere! The Hacker Lord has learned new tricks—only the power of Multi-Factor Authentication can keep him out. Have you heard of MFA?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: So you think you’re clever, huh? I’ll test you. If someone knows your password, can they get in without MFA?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Muahaha! Without MFA, your account is mine! Passwords alone are too weak!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Correct! MFA protects you even if your password leaks. Now learn more!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: MFA is a security spell requiring more than just a password. You must prove who you are in multiple ways—like showing an ID *and* knowing a secret handshake.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: There are three main authentication factors: Something you know (password), something you have (phone), and something you are (fingerprint). Which one interests you most?

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Passwords are useful, but alone they’re as fragile as a cookie in a dragon’s mouth. Let’s add more protection!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Phones, security keys, and magic tokens! If a thief steals your password, they still need your device to enter.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Fingerprints, face scans—your personal features! Hard to copy… unless the Hacker Lord starts collecting noses. Ew!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You’re trying to protect your treasure chest account. Which MFA method will you use?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Tch… SMS codes work, but I can sometimes steal them. Not bad though… I’ll retreat… for now!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Great choice! Authenticator apps are safer than SMS. Your treasure is well-guarded!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: NOOO! A hardware key?! Impossible to steal digitally! You are too strong!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: No MFA?! I just walked in and took everything. Easy win!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You protected your account with MFA—nice work. But there’s still room to improve!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Your defenses are strong! The Hacker Lord struggles to reach you. Stay vigilant!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You are unstoppable! With a hardware key and your mighty smarts, the cyber world applauds!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Next time, enable MFA… unless you enjoy losing treasure!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Story <The Two-Factorious Adventure> complete! Return when you seek more cyber power!

nodes.speaker: System
nodes.text: (a new article <MFA Learn Guide> is available in your Traveler's journal)
